{"id":695332873,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1Â year","timestamp":1651991259,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"33 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/695332873/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"17.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        int trapped = 0;\n        int n = height.size();\n        int maxLeft = height[0];\n        int maxRight = height[n-1];\n\n        int left=0, right=n-1;\n\n        while(left < right) {\n            if(maxLeft < maxRight) {\n                left++;\n                maxLeft = max(maxLeft,height[left]);\n                trapped += maxLeft - height[left];\n            }\n\n            else {\n                right--;\n                maxRight = max(maxRight,height[right]);\n                trapped += maxRight - height[right];\n            }\n        }\n\n        return trapped;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water","has_notes":false}
